itemDescription: English freestyle wrestler and mixed martial arts (MMA) fighter

wikipedia_page.main: Michael Grundy (born 1 March 1987) is an English professional mixed martial artist and retired freestyle wrestler who currently competes in the Featherweight division of the Ultimate Fighting Championship (UFC). During his wrestling career, Grundy most notably claimed a bronze medal from the 2014 Commonwealth Games.

response: *Mike Grundy, commonwealth games medalist, pro fighter

Lentz was expected to face Mike Grundy on January 16, 2021 at UFC on ABC 1.  However, a member of Grundy's team tested positive for COVID-19, and Lentz instead faced Movsar Evloev on January 24, 2021 at UFC 257. Lentz lost the fight via split decision.

Amirkhani was expected to face Mike Grundy at UFC Fight Night: Woodley vs. Edwards on March 21, 2020. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the event was eventually postponed and the bout scrapped. Instead Amirkhani faced Danny Henry on July 12, 2020 at UFC 251.   He won the fight via a submission in round one.
Amirkhani is scheduled to face Mike Grundy at UFC Fight Night 204 on March 19, 2022, in a rebooked bout after almost two years to date when they were originally compete.
Vannata moved down to featherweight and faced Mike Grundy at UFC 262 on May 15, 2021. He won his 145 lb debut via split decision.
*$5000 Stoppage Victory Bonuses: Simon Stadnicki, Likasz Pilch, Antonio Sheldon, Aaron Aby, Mike Grundy, Sam Boult, Vyacheslav Vasilevskiy, Batraz Agnaev
Narimani next faced Mike Grundy on March 16, 2019 at UFC Fight Night: Till vs. Masvidal.

link_mentions.page: UFC Fight Night: Andrade vs. Zhang
response: A featherweight bout between Movsar Evloev and Mike Grundy was scheduled for the event. However, on August 19, it was reported that Grundy was forced to pull out of the event citing injury.  He was replaced by promotional newcomer Lu Zhenhong. The pairing met previously in 2015 under M-1 Global with Evloev winning a decision.  Subsequently, the bout was scrapped from the event as Lu suffered a cut during a sparring session after the weigh-ins and was ruled out of the fight by medical personnel.

Evloev was then scheduled to face Mike Grundy on August 31, 2019 at UFC on ESPN+ 15. However, Grundy pulled out of the bout on August 19 citing an injury and was then set to be replaced by Zhenhong Lu. Hours out from the fight, Lu pulled out after suffering a cut.
Evloev faced Mike Grundy on July 26, 2020 at UFC on ESPN: Whittaker vs. Till. He won the fight by unanimous decision.
Evloev met Nik Lentz, replacing Mike Grundy,  at UFC 257 on January 24, 2021.  He won the fight via split decision.

link_mentions.page: UFC on ABC: Holloway vs. Kattar
response: A featherweight bout between Nik Lentz and Mike Grundy was scheduled for this event.  However, a member of Grundy's team tested positive for COVID-19, hence Lentz was given a new opponent off Movsar Evloev who he will face at UFC 257 in a catchweight bout of 150 pounds.
*Featherweight bout: Makwan Amirkhani vs. Mike Grundy
